positive.review: Honestly love this game! A baseball game was missing on PC but this one came in and took over! Once you get through the language barrier this game is pure fun! If they had full English support that would be great but I’m not complaining. Hopefully they see that the audience for Japanese baseball IS out there and we get a proper release of the series in the US. Would recommend 10/10
Great baseball game, just use google translate's camera for everything
